ygData.subject: Re: instrument switching and inventory
ygData.msgSnippet: I weave songs using the number keys. I select mobs either using the target nearest npc key or by using the target party member N key and assisting. I drive
ygData.messageBody:
I weave songs using the number keys. I select mobs either using the "target
nearest npc" key or by using the "target party member N" key and assisting. I
drive using the keypad on the right hand of the keyboard.

So to answer your question, no. :)

Taelin

> Er, don't you drop it while weaving songs and selecting mobs and moving
> around and looking around?
>
> Jesse <j@...>
>
> > I know a lot of people don't trust it, but here's what I do. I leave my
shield
> > (or second weapon) on my cursor. If you die or get disconnected the item
just
> > goes back into your inventory so it is safe.
> >
> > Taelin
